xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.7 Pañhāvāra » 9.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 9.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
97.
1032Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe aṭṭha, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1033Anulomaṃ.
<< 9.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
